TopicTitle: Camera can't decide what to do in low altitude flight

Articles.Content: I got to the Mun and got into orbit.  I brought my periapsis down to 3-4 thousand.  While skimming the surface, the camera couldn't decide whether it was in orbital mode or surface camera mode and showed the state flickering rapidly between the two.  It didn't make the camera jump around, but there was a big blinking box in the lower middle of my screen which was a bit distracting.  I noticed this again when I got down to a few thousand km above the Kerbin surface.
